name: Xml-beautifier-for-gawk
body:
# Welcome to the XML beautifier for Gawk wiki!

## Introduction

The XML beautifier for Gawk is an awk script for formating xml files. 

## Get Gawk

The script is required to run a version of gawk. This can be obtained at the following locations:

**for Windows:**
http://gnuwin32.sourceforge.net/packages/gawk.htm

**for Others:**
https://www.gnu.org/software/gawk/

## Run the formatxml.awk (on windows)

Sample parameters for the format **example.xml**. The script print the formated xml to screen:

`gawk -f formatxml.asw example.xml`

The formated xml redirection to a file:

`gawk -f formatxml.asw example.xml > formated.xml`

## You can read formating results in the **xmlinfo.txt**

For example (the example.xml result):

```
XML beautifier for Gawk By Vajay Attila (vajay.attila@gmail.com)
Version: 1.2.0.2

XML informations:

Number of tags: 16
No.0000000001 level: 0 type: closed comment tag             tag: <?xml version=1?> data: 
No.0000000002 level: 0 type: open tag                       tag: <parameters> data: 
No.0000000003 level: 1 type: closed tag                     tag: <return errorcode=2/> data: 
No.0000000004 level: 1 type: open tag                       tag: <list> data: 
No.0000000005 level: 2 type: closed comment tag             tag: <!--comment--> data: 
No.0000000006 level: 2 type: closed tag                     tag: <item name=3 value=4/> data: 
No.0000000007 level: 2 type: closed comment tag             tag: <!-- comment for item2--> data: 
No.0000000008 level: 2 type: open tag                       tag: <item2 isdata=5> data: 
No.0000000009 level: 2 type: value and end tag              tag: </item2> data: 1
No.0000000010 level: 2 type: closed comment tag             tag: <!-- comment for--> data: 
No.0000000011 level: 2 type: closed comment tag             tag: <!-- item3--> data: 
No.0000000012 level: 2 type: closed tag                     tag: <item3 value=6/> data: 
No.0000000013 level: 2 type: open tag                       tag: <item4> data: 
No.0000000014 level: 2 type: value and end tag              tag: </item4> data: 2
No.0000000015 level: 1 type: end tag                        tag: </list> data: 
No.0000000016 level: 0 type: end tag                        tag: </parameters> data: 

Number os datas: 2
No.0000000001 value: "value2
	1
	2
	3
																					"
No.0000000002 value: "item 
	
	value 4
	
	
	"

Number of attributes: 6
No.0000000001 value: "1.0"
No.0000000002 value: "0"
No.0000000003 value: "name attribute"
No.0000000004 value: "value attribute"
No.0000000005 value: "true"
No.0000000006 value: "dfsdfsdfsdfdsfsdfsdfsdf
    
    
    
    gfdjgjhfgjhgf
    gfdjfgjhfgjhfg"

Number of elements: 12
No.0000000001 begintag: 1 endtag: 1 begintagname: xml endtagname: xml
  Number of attributes: 1
    version = 1
No.0000000002 begintag: 2 endtag: 16 begintagname: parameters endtagname: parameters
No.0000000003 begintag: 3 endtag: 3 begintagname: return endtagname: return
  Number of attributes: 1
    errorcode = 2
No.0000000004 begintag: 4 endtag: 15 begintagname: list endtagname: list
No.0000000006 begintag: 6 endtag: 6 begintagname: item endtagname: item
  Number of attributes: 2
    name = 3
    value = 4
No.0000000008 begintag: 8 endtag: 9 begintagname: item2 endtagname: item2
  Data = 1
  Number of attributes: 1
    isdata = 5
No.0000000011 begintag: 12 endtag: 12 begintagname: item3 endtagname: item3
  Number of attributes: 1
    value = 6
No.0000000012 begintag: 13 endtag: 14 begintagname: item4 endtagname: item4
  Data = 2

End.
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
